description: Delete a time sheet line item equipment requirement.
permissions: Allowed if the user is authorized for the related time sheet line item via delegated policy to the time sheet. Admins are allowed. Non-admin access follows TimeSheetPolicy based on the time sheet subject (e.g., broker members, customer managers, trucker/driver roles, laborer users on labor requirements, or authorized work order roles/assignments).
side_effects: Deletes the time sheet line item equipment requirement; if it was primary, clears the time sheet line item equipment_requirement_id.
